snippet.title: Legendary Fishing: Available on Nintendo Switch™ and PlayStation®4  | Launch Trailer | Ubisoft [NA]
snippet.description:
Cast, hook and reel them in! Catch over 20 different types of fish, including bigmouth bass and rainbow trout. Battle the big ones with more than 50 lures and flies, plus multiple rod and reel combinations.

#LegendaryFishing #Ubisoft
Visit our official channels for the latest info on Legendary Fishing!
http://www.youtube.com/UbisoftNA


ABOUT:
Experience the thrill of catching fish in 10 realistic locations, each with different seasons and varying weather conditions. Family and friends can assist in attracting and reeling fish, helping players unlock trophies to become the most accomplished angler!
 
Whether you want to take up challenges, compete with family and friends, or relax and find zen, there’s always something to do and plenty of fish waiting. You will hone their skills in three different modes: Career, Arcade and Zen."

KEY FEATURES:

Cast, hook, and reel! Choose your tackle and hone your skills in three different modes in this arcade-style fishing game.

Challenge yourself with career mode, featuring 80 missions to take you from casual angler to legendary fisher.

Perfect your techniques to unlock 10 different venues with varied fish in four seasons and different weather conditions.

Play with up to four friends or family and challenge them into catching different types of fish.

THREE DIFFERENT MODES:
In Career mode, 80 missions challenge players as they progress from casual fishers to legendary anglers. Players can set up their own fishing tournaments in Arcade mode by selecting location, fish types and weather conditions, or play with no rules and just for relaxation in Zen mode.

MULTIPLAYER:
Compete with up to four players in split-screen.​

MOTION CONTROL:
Motion controls are available to cast with the Nintendo Switch Joy-Con™ controller or PlayStation®Move motion controller on PlayStation®4 system. Classic controls are also available.

Legendary Fishing: Available on Nintendo Switch™ and PlayStation®4  | Launch Trailer | Ubisoft [NA]
http://www.youtube.com/UbisoftNA
